ENDPOINT.details: LayerZero endpoint for this OApp (from NativeOFTAdapter).

EXECUTOR.details: Address that receives cached msg.value refunds when calling refund().

STARGATE_POOL.details: StargatePoolNative address (IOFT-based Stargate pool on this chain).

userdoc.notice: Multi-hop composer between:- NativeOFTAdapter (native ETH, e.g. Arbitrum), and- StargatePoolNative (Stargate, used as a routing hub to any dstEid).
